titleStmt.title: The Lord Byrons First articles presented to Sir William Brereton before the surrender of the city of Chester vvherein the great ambition of that party doth appear ...
titleStmt.author: Byron, John Byron, Baron, 1598 or 9-1652.
Brereton, William, Sir, 1604-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
